scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:bin
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:dist && npm run build:exe
scripts.build:sea: npm run build:sea:blob && npm run build:sea:cpnode && npm run build:sea:postject
scripts.build:sea:postject: npx postject bin/kafka-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod -w bin/kafka-linux
scripts.release: npm run tar && npm run zip
scripts.tar: npm run tar:linux && npm run tar:alpine && npm run tar:mac && npm run tar:win
scripts.tar:linux: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|kafka-linux|kafka|' -czvf rel/kafka-linux-x86.tar.gz kafka-linux
scripts.tar:alpine: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|kafka-alpine|kafka|' -czvf rel/kafka-alpine-x86.tar.gz kafka-alpine
scripts.tar:mac: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|kafka-macos|kafka|' -czvf rel/kafka-mac-x86.tar.gz kafka-macos
scripts.tar:win: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|kafka-win|kafka|' -czvf rel/kafka-win-x86.tar.gz kafka-win.exe
scripts.zip: npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:alpine && npm run zip:mac && npm run zip:win
scripts.zip:linux:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/kafka-linux-x86.zip bin/kafka-linux -j bin && printf '@ kafka-linux
@=kafka
' | zipnote -w rel/kafka-linux-x86.zip
scripts.zip:alpine:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/kafka-alpine-x86.zip bin/kafka-alpine -j bin && printf '@ kafka-alpine
@=kafka
' | zipnote -w rel/kafka-alpine-x86.zip
scripts.zip:mac:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/kafka-mac-x86.zip bin/kafka-macos -j bin && printf '@ kafka-macos
@=kafka
' | zipnote -w rel/kafka-mac-x86.zip
scripts.zip:win:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/kafka-win-x86.zip bin/kafka-win.exe -j bin && printf '@ kafka-win.exe
@=kafka.exe
' | zipnote -w rel/kafka-win-x86.zip
